name: A2Zapps.com
tag_list: cloud-computing, cloud-based, software, web-based, online, saas, paas, crm, erp, project
overview:
Business and growth is for all and we make efforts to ensure just that!

A2Zapps.com is the enterprise Cloud computing company that is revolutionizing the way companies use business software and enables its employees to collaborate and communicate with each other. A2Zapps.com offers the fastest path to business success through its state-of-the-art Cloud-based Work Platform which requires no installation of server or software and customers can get up and running instantly at an affordable monthly subscription fee. All apps are integrated, social and mobile in nature.

A successful business is for all therefore we make sure that the cutting edge technology reaches every corner and enables all businesses, primarily micro, small and medium enterprises, achieve the desired success and growth. With an aim to reduce IT hassles that restrict micro and emerging enterprises from growing we have put into action SaaS (wherein Software is provided as a Service) and PaaS ( wherein custom-made applications are deployed to a Cloud).

The companyâ€™s platform and services are primarily divided in three parts:

Work Desktop

It is worldâ€™s first-ever Windows-like Online Work Desktop for business employees and individuals to revamp the entire work culture by making it smarter, quicker, more efficient and economically viable. A2Z File Manager, a central place to manage, share & collaborate on documents A2Z Chitchat, a private social network for your enterprise A2Z Communicator, for scheduling and sending emails, SMSes A2Z Activity, for scheduling tasks, meetings

Apart from the basic apps, the Online Desktop enables the user to easily add any number of business/department specific work apps to the Desktop at an affordable monthly subscription fee.

Work App Store

A2Z Work App Store is a marketplace with ready-made business (Customer Relationship Management, Human Resources, Finance & administration etc.), productivity and social apps. We put forward business software as utility services to introduce to the World, a cost effective and rapidly growing business mantra that primarily revolves around emerging businesses

Work App Builder

A2Zapps allows companies and individuals to custom build their own apps in the Cloud using the innovative Developer toolkit available in the desktop itself; and no technical knowledge is required to build these apps. The application design, development and testing are done over the Internet, with strictly no hardware or Software installation. Even the ongoing maintenance falls on the vendorâ€™s account and the customer stays out of it

This cost-effective Cloud Platform is sure to bring long term benefits to various industries including: Education, Health Care, Non-Profit Organizations, Real Estate, Small Manufacturing Companies, and Professionals such as Chartered Accountants and Travel Agents.

Built upon redundant hardware components A2Zapps.comâ€™s truly On-Demand Work Platform is hosted in Tier 3+ data center for a superior degree of fault tolerance and availability. We call it truly On-Demand because it can be accessed securely from any Internet-enabled device including PC, Laptop, Nettop, Tablet PC, Smart phones, etc. from anywhere across the world. No IT resources are needed to manage the platform and it can easily support any level of customization that an organization might need. Its intuitive and easy-to-navigate interfaces drive higher adoption of the system among users.
